## NotifyAction type

Action to display notifications in specified UI targets. Used to notify applications to handle error messages through the indicated display mechanisms.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type NotifyAction = {
    action: 'notify';
    payload: {
        targets: HandlingTarget[];
        [key: string]: any;
    };
};
```
**References:** [HandlingTarget](./error-x.handlingtarget.md)

## Example


```typescript
{
  action: 'notify',
  payload: {
    targets: [HandlingTargets.TOAST, 'custom-sidebar'],
    title: 'Error occurred',
    duration: 5000
  }
}
```
